items.summary: Update the Header search input to use a fully-rounded border radius equivalent to 9999px (e.g., Tailwind `rounded-full`) so the input appears pill-shaped in all responsive layouts.
Update all buttons in the Header to use a fully-rounded border radius equivalent to 9999px (e.g., Tailwind `rounded-full`) so they appear pill-shaped across desktop and mobile header layouts.
Update the 'Start a Pond' button on the All Ponds page to use a fully-rounded border radius equivalent to 9999px (e.g., Tailwind `rounded-full`).

Update the following buttons on the User Settings page to use a fully-rounded border radius equivalent to 9999px (e.g., Tailwind `rounded-full`): 'Save Changes', 'Save Froggy Phrase', and 'Choose Avatar'.
